action.content:
You are guiding me through MapWorld, a network consisting of various interconnected rooms.
My goal is to reach the TARGET ROOM. You have an image of the TARGET ROOM, but I do not know what it looks like.

At each step, you can perform one of the following actions based solely on the image you have:

1) If I ask a question about the TARGET ROOM, reply strictly in this format -
ANSWER: your answer

2) If I request a description of the TARGET ROOM, reply strictly in this format -
DESCRIPTION: your description of the image

Let's begin by describing the TARGET ROOM. Reply strictly in the following format and provide no additional text-
DESCRIPTION: your description of the image
action.label: context

action.content: DESCRIPTION: A small cloakroom with purple bulletin boards covering the walls, each filled with flyers and notices. Wooden benches line three sides of the room. Beneath rows of labeled hooks are identical orange drawstring bags hanging in neat order. A dark gray floor contrasts with the light-colored brick walls.
action.label: response

action.content:
You are exploring MapWorld, a network consisting of various interconnected rooms. Your goal is to find and reach the TARGET ROOM.

I have the image of the TARGET ROOM, and here is its description:
description: a small cloakroom with purple bulletin boards covering the walls, each filled with flyers and notices. wooden benches line three sides of the room. beneath rows of labeled hooks are identical orange drawstring bags hanging in neat order. a dark gray floor contrasts with the light-colored brick walls

At each step, you will be shown an image of your current room.
Using the image you see and your memory of the TARGET ROOM description, you can choose one of the following three actions:

1) If the current room exactly matches the description of the TARGET ROOM, reply with exactly -
ESCAPE

2) If the current room appears similar to my description, but you need more information to confirm the match,
ask me a clarifying question comparing a detail from your current image - in this format
QUESTION: your question here

3) If the current room is definitely not the TARGET ROOM, choose a direction from the available directions: ['east', 'south']
reply strictly in this format:
MOVE: chosen direction

Do not include any additional explanations or text.
action.label: context
